backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor definition serving as the backend entry point.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting a completed text correction from 'वैशेलिया साइकोकेयर' to 'वैचेलिया साइकोकेयर' in the translations file.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON-formatted summaries of three frontend files: translations utility, Header component, and HomePage component, all related to the Vachellia Psychocare bilingual branding.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables for light and dark themes, defining colors for UI components, charts, and sidebar elements.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with root div and module script reference to main.tsx, titled 'Cyber Security Awareness Platform'.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main application component configuring TanStack Router with seven routes (home, online safety, digital wellbeing, government initiatives, security measures, complaints, resources) wrapped in Theme and Language providers.
frontend/src/components/BilingualText.ts: Component that renders text in English, Hindi, or both languages based on the current language context setting.
frontend/src/components/ContentSection.t: Card-based section component with bilingual title support, optional icon, and flexible content rendering.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer component displaying about info, emergency helplines (1930, 1091), resource links, copyright notice, and caffeine.ai attribution with bilingual support.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Sticky header with Shield logo, bilingual 'Suraksha Shiksha' branding, desktop/mobile navigation for seven routes, and language toggle button.
frontend/src/components/HelplineCard.tsx: Card component displaying helpline information with phone icon, bilingual name and description, and prominent number display.
frontend/src/components/LanguageToggle.t: Button component that cycles through three language modes (both/en/hi) displaying current selection with Languages icon.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Root layout component wrapping Header, main content outlet, and Footer in a flex column structure.
frontend/src/components/ResourceCard.tsx: Card component for displaying downloadable or external resources with bilingual title/description, optional category badge, and action button.
frontend/src/contexts/LanguageContext.ts: React context providing language state (both/en/hi) and translation helper function for bilingual text rendering throughout the app.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom hook managing authenticated/anonymous backend actor instances using React Query, Internet Identity, and automatic query invalidation on identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: React hook and provider for Internet Identity authentication on ICP, managing login state, identity persistence, and delegation validation with configurable AuthClient options.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables for light/dark theme color schemes, including sidebar, chart, and UI component tokens using OKLCH color space.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that renders the root component with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider wrappers.
frontend/src/pages/ComplaintMechanismsPa: Page displaying cyber crime reporting options including emergency helplines (1930, 1091), online portals, and contact information with bilingual English/Hindi content.
Tabbed page covering digital wellbeing topics including screen time impacts, social media addiction statistics, and mental health strategies with bilingual support.
frontend/src/pages/GovernmentInitiatives: Page showcasing Indian government cyber security initiatives (Cyber Surakshit Bharat, ISEA, Digital India) and resources like CERT-In with bilingual descriptions and external links.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Landing page with hero section and six navigation cards for Online Safety, Digital Wellbeing, Government Initiatives, Security Measures, Report Cyber Crime, and Resources sections.
frontend/src/pages/OnlineSafetyPage.tsx: Bilingual page covering online safety fundamentals including password security, phishing awareness, social media privacy, secure browsing, and safe online shopping with expandable accordion sections and icons.
frontend/src/pages/ResourcesPage.tsx: Bilingual resources page with tabbed sections (Government, Educational, Tools) displaying external links to CERT-In, MeitY, Cyber Crime Portal, Digital India, and other cyber security resources using ResourceCard components.
Bilingual page providing practical security tools and techniques including antivirus software recommendations, VPN usage, two-factor authentication, device security, WiFi safety, and backup strategies with accordion-based content organization.
frontend/src/utils/translations.ts: Translation object containing English and Hindi text pairs for navigation items, home page hero section, and branding elements used throughout the application.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom theme extensions including OKLCH color system, sidebar colors, border radius variables, custom animations for accordions, and plugins for typography and container queries.
project_state.json: Project metadata defining a bilingual cyber security awareness platform for Indian colleges with architectural notes, existing features covering homepage, online safety, digital wellbeing, government initiatives, security measures, and complaint mechanisms.
